issue.title: RFC: Reflector to reflect on all attributes
issue.body:
A bare-minimum, proof-of-concept implementation for gathering all ReflectionAttributes from a given source. This PR updates the Reflector interface and DefaultReflector implementation to include a reflectAllAttributes() method that will return a list of ReflectionAttribute. Additionally, several type-hints on parameters and method returns have been updated to include Node\Attribute and ReflectionAttribute where appropriate.

This implementation is not meant to represent something fully working or ready to be merged in but to spark a conversation on the desired feature.

---

Hi! Thanks for the awesome library! I have a use case for statically analyzing Attributes in a PHP codebase. To facilitate this I added a `Reflector::reflectAllAttributes()` method that will return a list of ReflectionAttribute instances. Before I continued with this work I wanted to get the maintainers feedback to:

1. See if this feature is even desired by the team and would be open to merging in to the codebase.
2. Collaborate on possible concerns with the implementation and to solidify the changes to the Reflector API.

## Todo

1. Finish testing and implementing the `ReflectionAttribute::createFromNode` method to construct the correct reflection for the node that owns the attribute.
2. Introduce additional methods on the `Reflector` interface for narrowing the ReflectionAttributes returned.

comment.body: @Ocramius The concern there is that the owner of the Attribute might not be a class. It could be a property, a method, a parameter on the method, or a class constant. Not only would you have to iterate over every ReflectionClass but all of its properties and methods as well. In addition, this would not include places where a function is the owner of the Attribute.

issue.body:
A bare-minimum, proof-of-concept implementation for gathering all ReflectionAttributes from a given source. This PR updates the Reflector interface and DefaultReflector implementation to include a reflectAllAttributes() method that will return a list of ReflectionAttribute. Additionally, several type-hints on parameters and method returns have been updated to include Node\Attribute and ReflectionAttribute where appropriate.

This implementation is not meant to represent something fully working or ready to be merged in but to spark a conversation on the desired feature.

---

Hi! Thanks for the awesome library! I have a use case for statically analyzing Attributes in a PHP codebase. To facilitate this I added a `Reflector::reflectAllAttributes()` method that will return a list of ReflectionAttribute instances. Before I continued with this work I wanted to get the maintainers feedback to:

1. See if this feature is even desired by the team and would be open to merging in to the codebase.
2. Collaborate on possible concerns with the implementation and to solidify the changes to the Reflector API.

## Todo

1. Finish testing and implementing the `ReflectionAttribute::createFromNode` method to construct the correct reflection for the node that owns the attribute.
2. Introduce additional methods on the `Reflector` interface for narrowing the ReflectionAttributes returned.

comment.body: Hi! Thanks for the feedback. When I originally introduced this I was under the wrong assumption that the ReflectionAttribute class included the information about the target as well. Now that I realize I was mistaken my expected use case is no longer valid. Sorry for the confusion!

repo.name: BetterReflection
repo.description: :crystal_ball: Better Reflection is a reflection API that aims to improve and provide more features than PHP's built-in reflection API.

release.name: v0.3.0
release.body:
## What's Changed
* Extract CLI tool and test code examples by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/annotated-container/pull/26
* Improve the docs in readme by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/annotated-container/pull/27
* Rework internal compiler code by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/annotated-container/pull/28
* Feature/primary service by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/annotated-container/pull/29
* Feature/profiles as argument by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/annotated-container/pull/30
* Remove roadmap from readme by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/annotated-container/pull/42
* Add ability to retrieve service with arbitrary label by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/annotated-container/pull/43
* Feature/third party code/34 by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/annotated-container/pull/50
* Feature/shared service/36 by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/annotated-container/pull/51
* Task/update docs changelog 0.3 by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/annotated-container/pull/52
* Add isShared to service function by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/annotated-container/pull/53


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cspray/annotated-container/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0

commits.message:
Feature/shared service/36 (#51)

* Add isShared to ServiceDefinition and builder

* Remove redundant tests

* Add tests for shared service

* Change the way we traverse to not require 2x traversals

* Add non-shared service to serialization

* Update to use correct dummy apps

commits.message:
Feature Request: Reflect All Attributes

A bare-minimum, proof-of-concept implementation for gathering all
ReflectionAttributes from a given source. This PR updates the Reflector
interface and DefaultReflector implementation to include a
reflectAllAttributes() method that will return a list of
ReflectionAttribute. Additionally, several type-hints on parameters and
method returns have been updated to include Node\Attribute and
ReflectionAttribute where appropriate.

This implementation is not meant to represent something fully working or
ready to be merged in but to spark a conversation on the desired
feature.
